name: Decisions
tagline: Highly concurrent claims based system for performing bespoke authorization checks.
body:
Overview
=========

Intended to be a self contained WebAPI based application that will use RESTful endpoints to describe claims that can then be configured to execute bespoke code for decision resolution.

Example
=========

Example can be found in the repositories Test and Web projects.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
